properties.entry: SELECT RES_NO , RES_NAME , CEO , PERMIT_NO , ADDRESS , D_ADDRESS , LOCAL_CT , DLOCAL_CT , PHONE , CELLPHONE , EMAIL , PARKING , STATUS , LONGTITUDE , LATITUDE , R_IMG , OPEN , CLOSE , BREAK_S , BREAK_E , FOOD_CT FROM RESTAURANT WHERE RES_NO=? AND USER_PWD=? AND STATUS IN ('Y', 'C')
UPDATE RESTAURANT SET USER_PWD = ? , STATUS = 'Y' WHERE RES_NO = ?
UPDATE RESTAURANT SET OPEN = ? , CLOSE = ? , BREAK_S = ? , BREAK_E = ? WHERE RES_NO = ?

SELECT RES_NO , RES_NAME , CEO , PERMIT_NO , ADDRESS , D_ADDRESS , LOCAL_CT , DLOCAL_CT , PHONE , CELLPHONE , EMAIL , PARKING , STATUS , LONGTITUDE , LATITUDE , R_IMG , OPEN , CLOSE , BREAK_S , BREAK_E , FOOD_CT FROM RESTAURANT WHERE RES_NO=? AND STATUS = 'Y'
INSERT INTO MENU ( MENU_NO , RES_NO , MENU_NAME , PRICE , MENU_DES , M_IMG ) VALUES ( SEQ_MNO.NEXTVAL , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? )
SELECT RES_NO , MENU_NO , MENU_NAME , PRICE , MENU_DES , M_IMG FROM MENU WHERE RES_NO=? ORDER BY MENU_NO
UPDATE MENU SET MENU_NAME = ? , PRICE = ? , MENU_DES = ? , M_IMG = ? WHERE MENU_NO = ?
UPDATE RESTAURANT SET ADDRESS = ? , D_ADDRESS = ? , PHONE = ? , CELLPHONE = ? , EMAIL = ? , PARKING = ? , R_IMG = ? , OPEN = ? , CLOSE = ? , BREAK_S = ? , BREAK_E = ? , FOOD_CT = ? WHERE RES_NO = ?
DELETE FROM MENU WHERE MENU_NO = ?

SELECT Q_NO , CATEGORY , Q_TITLE , USER_ID , Q.STATUS , TO_CHAR(CREATE_DATE, 'YYYY/MM/DD') "CREATE_DATE" FROM QUESTION Q JOIN TB_USER ON (Q_PERSON=USER_NO) WHERE A_PERSON = ? ORDER BY Q.STATUS, CREATE_DATE DESC
SELECT Q_NO , CATEGORY , Q_TITLE , USER_ID , Q.STATUS , TO_CHAR(CREATE_DATE, 'YYYY/MM/DD') "CREATE_DATE" , Q_CONTENT , A_CONTENT FROM QUESTION Q JOIN TB_USER ON (Q_PERSON=USER_NO) WHERE Q_NO = ?
UPDATE QUESTION SET MODIFY_DATE = SYSDATE , A_DATE = SYSDATE , STATUS = 'Y' , A_CONTENT = ? WHERE Q_NO = ?

SELECT REVIEW_NO , USER_ID , REVIEW_CONTENT , STAR , BOOK_NO , TO_CHAR(CREATE_DATE, 'YYYY/MM/DD') "CREATE_DATE" , GOOD FROM REVIEW JOIN TB_USER USING (USER_NO) WHERE RES_NO = ? ORDER BY REVIEW_NO DESC
SELECT Q_NO , Q_TITLE , Q_CONTENT , TO_CHAR(CREATE_DATE, 'YYYY/MM/DD') "CREATE_DATE" FROM QUESTION WHERE A_PERSON = ? AND STATUS= 'N' ORDER BY CREATE_DATE DESC
SELECT REVIEW_NO , TO_CHAR(CREATE_DATE, 'YYYY/MM/DD') "CREATE_DATE" , REVIEW_CONTENT FROM REVIEW WHERE RES_NO = ? AND GOOD = 'N' ORDER BY CREATE_DATE DESC
SELECT REVIEW_NO , USER_ID , REVIEW_CONTENT , STAR , BOOK_NO , TO_CHAR(CREATE_DATE, 'YYYY/MM/DD') "CREATE_DATE" , GOOD FROM REVIEW JOIN TB_USER USING (USER_NO) WHERE REVIEW_NO = ?
INSERT INTO BLACK ( BLACK_NO , B_PERSON , T_PERSON , BLACK_TITEL , BLACK_CONTENT , BLACK_TYPE ) VALUES ( SEQ_MNO.NEXTVAL , ? , ? , '업체 리뷰 신고' , ? , 'RV' )
SELECT FILE_NO , CHANGE_NAME , FILE_PATH FROM ATTACHMENT WHERE REF_BNO = ? AND STATUS = 'Y'

SELECT BOOK_NO , TO_CHAR(BOOK_A, 'YYYY/MM/DD') "BOOK_A" , BOOK_NAME , BOOK_DATE , BOOK_TIME , STATUS
FROM BOOK WHERE RES_NO = ? ORDER BY BOOK_NO DESC
SELECT BOOK_NO , BOOK_DATE , BOOK_TIME , PEOPLE , BOOK_NAME , BOOK_PHONE , EMAIL , REQUEST , STATUS FROM BOOK WHERE BOOK_NO = ?
SELECT BM_NO , MENU_NAME , MENU_COUNT , PRICE , BM_PRICE FROM BOOK_MENU JOIN MENU USING (MENU_NO) WHERE BOOK_NO = ? ORDER BY BM_NO DESC
SELECT PAY_NO , PAY_DATE , PAY_OP , PAY_TOTAL FROM PAYMENT WHERE BOOK_NO = ?
UPDATE BOOK SET MODIFY_DATE = SYSDATE , STATUS = ? WHERE BOOK_NO = ?
SELECT BOOK_NO , BOOK_NAME , PEOPLE , BOOK_DATE , BOOK_TIME FROM BOOK WHERE RES_NO = ? AND STATUS = 'B' ORDER BY BOOK_NO DESC

SELECT PAY_NO , BOOK_NO , TO_CHAR(MODIFY_DATE, 'YYYY/MM/DD') "MODIFY_DATE" , PAY_TOTAL FROM PAYMENT P JOIN BOOK B USING (BOOK_NO) WHERE B.RES_NO = ? AND B.STATUS = 'D' AND MODIFY_DATE + (INTERVAL '7' DAY) BETWEEN ? AND ? ORDER BY MODIFY_DATE ASC
INSERT INTO NOT_ABLE ( NOT_NO , RES_NO , NOT_YEAR , NOT_MONTH , NOT_DATE ) VALUES ( SEQ_NANO.NEXTVAL , ? , ? , ? , ? )
SELECT NOT_NO , NOT_DATE FROM NOT_ABLE WHERE RES_NO = ? AND NOT_YEAR = ? AND NOT_MONTH = ?
DELETE FROM NOT_ABLE WHERE RES_NO = ? AND NOT_YEAR=? AND NOT_MONTH=? AND NOT_DATE=?
SELECT BOOK_NO , BOOK_DATE FROM BOOK WHERE RES_NO = ? AND SUBSTR(BOOK_DATE,0,4) = ? AND SUBSTR(BOOK_DATE,6,2) = ?

SELECT RE.RES_NO "RES_NO" , RES_NAME , ADDRESS , D_ADDRESS , PHONE , R_IMG , OPEN , CLOSE , BREAK_S , BREAK_E , AVG(STAR) "AVG_STAR" , RS.COUNT "COUNT" FROM REVIEW RE JOIN restaurant RS ON (RE.RES_NO = RS.RES_NO) GROUP BY RE.RES_NO , RES_NAME , ADDRESS , D_ADDRESS , PHONE , R_IMG , OPEN , CLOSE , BREAK_S , BREAK_E , RS.COUNT ORDER BY AVG(STAR) DESC

SELECT RE.RES_NO , RES_NAME , ADDRESS , D_ADDRESS , PHONE , R_IMG , OPEN , CLOSE , BREAK_S , BREAK_E , AVG(STAR) "AVG_STAR" , RS.COUNT FROM REVIEW RE JOIN restaurant RS ON (RE.RES_NO = RS.RES_NO) GROUP BY RE.RES_NO , RES_NAME , ADDRESS , D_ADDRESS , PHONE , R_IMG , OPEN , CLOSE , BREAK_S , BREAK_E , RS.COUNT , RE.COUNT ORDER BY RS.COUNT DESC , AVG(STAR) DESC
